name: Abhoy Mission

address: Abhoy Mission, Ramnagar Road No. 1, P.O - Ramnagar, Agartala, Tripura - 799002

briefDescription: Abhoy Mission is providing services to the destitute senior citizens with mental illness, Schizophrenia, Parkinson patient for permanent rehabilitation & orphan children with disabilities. It is providing well-structured & multidimensional services in the field of skill & manpower development creating employment scope taking the community at large into account. Our mission is to reduce the incidence of disability in the State and to grow confidence in the mind of the senior citizens.
